bountiful.tip.time_management: Time management is key. Plan your bounty hunts efficiently to maximize your rewards before they expire.
bountiful.tip.rare_bounties: Keep an eye out for rare bounties. Epic-tier rewards can significantly boost your progress!
bountiful.tip.combine_decrees: Combine different Decrees on your Bounty Board to create a diverse mix of objectives and rewards.
bountiful.tip.exciting_adventure: Remember, bounty boards aren't just for profit - they're your ticket to a more exciting Minecraft adventure!
bountiful.tip.check_bounties: Check the Bounty Board regularly. New bounties appear over time, offering fresh challenges and rewards!
